mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from comments
select cnum, no, writer, content, to_char(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, remark from comments where no=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into comments (cnum, no, writer, content, regdate) values (seqcomm.nextval, #{no}, #{writer} ,#{content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update comments set content = #{content} where cnum = #{cnum}
